subject: Re: Question about locations for LPR
body:
[EXTERNAL ?]

Do we have anything from ODOT that we can save for our records showing their approval for the poles in their ROW? Do not want to do anything that would sour our opportunity to install in their ROW in the future.
	
 
Matt Triana
Project Manager



	
 https://kesq.com/news/2024/06/24/flock-license-plate-reading-cameras-have-led-to-more-than-30-arrests-says-palm-springs-police-department?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=PMO&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 	 
 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/GG1LX1QJMN.png> 


On Wed, May 21, 2025 at 12:42?PM BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov > wrote:


	Thank you 

	 

	 

	Jake Burke

	Captain � Investigations Division

	Eugene Police Department

	300 Country Club Road

	Eugene, Oregon 97401

	(541) 682-5895 work

	 

	 

	From: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov > 
	Sent: Wednesday, May 21, 2025 12:42 PM
	To: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov >
	Cc: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >; Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com >
	Subject: RE: Question about locations for LPR

	 

	Good to go on all 3 locations � COE!

	 

	Bret Jones

	Traffic Operations

	City of Eugene

	O:541-682-4908

	C:541-228-5722

	 

	From: BURKE Jacob T <JBurke@eugene-or.gov JBurke@eugene-or.gov > 
	Sent: Wednesday, May 21, 2025 12:33 PM
	To: JONES Bret <BJones@eugene-or.gov BJones@eugene-or.gov >
	Cc: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov >; Matt Triana <matt.triana@flocksafety.com matt.triana@flocksafety.com >
	Subject: Question about locations for LPR

	 

	Bret, 

	 

	I have copied Det. Dewitt and Matt Triana, Flock, to this email.  Can you assist with clarification on 3 locations that we are trying to install LPR cameras?  I attached a word document with a location description/picture for your reference.  We need to confirm what permissions will be necessary to install or if we need to go through ODOT or if COE owned.  

	 

	Thank you 

	 

	 

	Jake Burke

	Captain � Investigations Division

	Eugene Police Department

	300 Country Club Road

	Eugene, Oregon 97401

	(541) 682-5895 work
